pageContext.quote: When your sparring partner scratches or head-butts you, you don’t thenmake a show of it, or protest, or view him with suspicion or as plottingagainst you. And yet you keep an eye on him, not as an enemy or withsuspicion, but with a healthy avoidance. You should act this way with allthings in life. We should give a pass to many things with our fellowtrainees. For, as I’ve said, it’s possible to avoid without suspicion orhate.
